Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Dao Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Dao, Province of Capiz, to Senator Gerardo M. Roxas Memorial District Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 826
An Act Changing the Name of the Dao Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Dao, Province of Capiz, to Senator Gerardo M. Roxas Memorial District Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Dao Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Dao, Province of Capiz, is changed to Senator Gerardo M. Roxas Memorial District Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
